module.name: test_requirement_allocation
module.keywords: module, test requirement, allocation, functional specification

abstract.p: the representation of test requirement allocation to a product where there is a reference simulation model provided or where there is a functional specification provided. The specific usage is to allow representation of items in an abstract test harness using the nodal formulation provided in this standard.
abstract.li: component data sheet functional performance representation;
identification of test requirement based on a simulation model;
identification of test requirement based on a functional specification.

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of test requirement allocation to a product where there is a reference simulation model provided or where there is a functional specification provided. The specific usage is to allow representation of items in an abstract test harness using the nodal formulation provided in this standard.
purpose.example: The behavioural charts and tables on a component data sheet may be represented and bound to a representation of the real or virtual lab bench setup used to make the measurements using this part of ISO 10303.

inscope.li: identification of test requirement based on a simulation model;
identification of test requirement based on a functional specification;

items within the scope of application module Functional usage view, ISO/TS 10303-1705;
items within the scope of application module Requirement decomposition, ISO/TS 10303-1740.

outscope.li: Detailed definition of waveform semantics and format.
